sense.def:
Izraz
there
se uporablja kot prazni ali formalni osebek ob glagolu
be
, kadar želimo povedati, da nekaj (ne) obstaja, ali pritegniti pozornost na tisto.

seg.quote: There was a new cushion on one of the settees.
Beside them there curls up a twist of blue smoke.
There still remains the point about creativity.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
there
, obstaja ali je dosegljivo.

seg.quote: We talked about reality, about whether things are really there.
The play group is there for the children of staff and students.

sense.def:
Izraz
there
uporabljamo za kraj, ki je že bil omenjen.

seg.quote: I must get home. Bill's there on his own.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
there
opišemo kraj, na katerega pokažemo ali ki ga gledamo.

seg.quote: ‘Over there,’ she said and pointed to the door.
Where's the ball? Oh, there it is.

sense.def:
Izraz
there
uporabimo pri telefoniranju, ko sprašujemo, ali je nekdo v bližini telefona, tako da bi lahko govorili z njim.

Z izrazom
there
vzpostavimo povezavo z določenim mestom v sogovornikovi izjavi.

seg.quote: Could I interrupt you just there?

sense.def:
Z izrazom
there
pokažemo na stopnjo, do katere se je razvila določena dejavnost ali proces.

seg.quote: I'll write to the headmaster and then take the matter from there.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
there and then
ali
then and there
, se zgodi takoj.

seg.quote: He terminated the discussion then and there.

sense.def:
There you are
ali
there you go
rečemo tudi, kadar sprejmemo nezadovoljiv položaj.

cit.quote: tako pač je; je, kar je

seg.quote: It wasn't a very good reason for refusing, but there you are.

sense.def:
There you are
ali
there you go
rečemo tudi, kadar želimo poudariti, da nekaj dokazuje, da imamo prav.

seg.quote: There you are, Mabel! What did I tell you?

sense.def:
There you are
ali
there you go
rečemo, kadar nekomu nekaj damo.

seg.quote: ‘There you are’, he said, handing the screws to me.
Well, I won't apologize, so there.
